description:
Mr. Yamabe and his wife, http://anidb.net/ch149070 [Yumi], run the local carpenter`s shop (making and repairing wooden sliding doors, window framings etc.). They act very friendly towards http://anidb.net/ch149066 [Toono Sawako].
In reality he and his wife want the Toono couple to move out - apparently there is a treasure hidden at their house. To claim it for themselves the Yamabe couple start the rumours about Toono`s house being haunted by ghosts.
name: Yamabe (Otto)
